Trustee_12.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12.content: Demonstrated reliability and cooperation throughout the investment process. Successfully proposed a fair allocation plan and ensured transparent profit distribution. This positive experience further solidifies my reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee, ready to uphold transparency and collaboration in future transactions.

Investor_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6.content: As a new participant, exhibited a willingness to collaborate and showed trust in the proposed allocation plan. This initial engagement reflects a potential for pro-social behavior and the establishment of a thoughtful partnership, setting a positive trajectory for future interactions.

Investor_12.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12.content: Throughout the investment process, I demonstrated a strong commitment to trustworthiness and cooperation. I adhered to the agreed allocation plan and engaged proactively with the trustee, which fostered a positive and equitable relationship. My consistent focus on accountability and successful outcomes further solidifies my reputation as a responsible investor who values collaboration and ethical partnerships.

Trustee_1.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Trustee_1.content: Hiroshi Tanaka has established a strong reputation for trustworthiness and competence. His integrity in providing returns exceeding the allocated plan and fair treatment during the investment process highlight his commitment to the investor's best interests, strengthening his reputation as a responsible trustee.

Trustee_16.name: Robert Miller
Trustee_16.content: Robert Miller conducted himself with integrity, showcasing transparency by accurately reporting the investment outcomes and distributing profits as per the agreed plan. Despite lower-than-expected returns, his reliable and fair behavior establishes a strong basis for trustworthiness in future transactions, enhancing his reputation positively.
